content: techniques to successfully complete this scarf fig 1 pencil tip with zig-zag fig 2 metal clamp & eraser 2 01 7 ht t ps / / w ww fac e bobble ok c om/ aunt je nny hat s page 3 the sharpened pencil scarf instructions pencil point using the yarn color for the pencil lead magic_ring chain 1 row 1 2 single_crochet into the magic_ring tighten ring to close 2 st row 2 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in each stich 4 st row 3 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 5 st row 4 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 3 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 6 st row 5 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 4 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 7 st row 6 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 5 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich finish off 8 st using the yarn color for the wood row 7 bind on and chain 1 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 6 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 9 st row 8 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 7 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 10 st row 9 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 8 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 11 st row 10 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 9 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 12 st row 11 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 10 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 13 st row 12 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 11 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 14 st row 13 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 12 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 15 st row 14 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 13 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 16 st row 15 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 14 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 17 st row 16 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 15 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 18 st row 17 chain 1 turn 1 single_crochet in that stich and in the next 16 stitches 2 single_crochet in the last stich 19 st you will be using two colors from this point forward to create the zig-zag of a sharpened pencil when one color is being used the second color is carried behind refer to fig 1 and the zig-zag stitch chart located at the end of this
